document_data.mainbody:
arid was a wealthy and influential Zakharan merchant inhabiting Hiyal around 1367 DR.
Farid encountered an Al-Badia named Jamal al-Karim who he believed insulted him. Farid ended up killing Jamal and incurring the wrath of Jamals tribe, the House of Al-Karim, in the form of a blood feud.
Farid adoptive dwarven son was Umar bin Farid.
